welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Bures-sur-Yvette, France! Get ready to experience our charming town known for its beautiful parks and historic buildings. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in the local culture."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Toussus-le-noble Airport, handling both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal South
terminals.description: The largest and busiest terminal at Orly Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal West
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Orly Airport, primarily used for low-cost and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport, but may require a registration process.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights and is the main terminal at Le Bourget Airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights and is located next to Terminal 1.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Paris Cergy Pontoise Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Paris Cergy Pontoise Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, serving international flights for Air France and other major airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, divided into 7 sub-terminals and serving a variety of airlines and destinations.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, mainly used for low-cost airlines and domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Premium high-speed WiFi is also available for purchase.
